title: Grab this pocket-sized 5,000mAh MagSafe-compatible power bank for just $20
content:
Macworld

MagSafe is a fantastic feature when you’re too lazy to plug in your iPhone at night but it’s even better when you can leave your cable at home while traveling. And today you can get a portable magnetic power bank for super cheap: Amazon is selling the UGreen 5,000mAh Magnetic Power Bank for $20, a savings of $10 and the best price we’ve ever seen.

This power bank has a 5,000mAh capacity, which is more than enough to fill any iPhone from 0 to 100 percent and then some. As a MagSafe-compatible case, it offers 7.5W charging, but you can keep it attached to your phone while using it for all-day power. It weighs just 145 grams (about 5 ounces), so it’s easy to toss into a bag, and you can use it as a wired charging bank as well for faster charging. It also works with most cases so you’ll just snap it on and go.

Apple charges $99 for its own MagSafe battery pack which is heavier and smaller, so if you’re looking for an easy way to keep your iPhone charged on the go, grab this Limited Time deal before the price jumps back up.
